fields_of_interest: Consumers, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: We actively follow any action on Climate change protocols, initiatives, COOP21.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The aim of ‘it is about us’ is to become a worldwide movement for sustainable development.  
 
We provide information, create awareness and inspire people and society in general to get together and take the action required for people and planet to be on a sustainable track by 2030.  
 
Overall Global Objectives:  
1)    Initiate a movement for sustainable energy 
This might have different entry’s that will help to create awareness on sustainable energy, that lead to decarbonization. The aim is to develop a DDP in every country and to create demand for the implementation of the Pathway. To: 
      a) facilitate the development of a Deep Decarbonization Pathway, DDP in the country 
      b) create demand for the development and implementation of the DDP  
 
2)    Initiate a movement for sustainable lifestyle; sustainable consumption/production
